7.35pm, Thursday:

Quick look at the flood maps: #Flooding is expected tonight or Friday in SIX parts of the South East... and possible in 36 more... Not just drama on Eastenders...

Get the very latest here and register for alerts: https://t.co/iWzdv9CeI8

Be #floodaware https://t.co/133v5ToXbx

tweets.text: @NaturalEngland @CRTContactUs @Brent_Council @EnvAgency @ChrisGPackham @WildLondon @Thames21 Biodiversity threatened by Giant Hogweed, Himalayan Balsam, Japanese Knotweed, contaminated silt, microplastics, lack of dredging, sluggish consultative committee, absence of rangers, no cohesive management. One of London‚Äôs premier SSSI‚Äôs deserves better.

Work starts on Monday.
https://t.co/rzGwIUAxhK

Why does this happen? Why is it allowed to happen?
@Feargal_Sharkey @EnvAgency @GeorgeMonbiot @ChrisGPackham https://t.co/x5h2ZuELJ7

@BenGoldsmith @MarkAvery @CelticReptile @patrick_barkham @NaturalEngland @ChrisGPackham @GeorgeMonbiot @ARC_Bytes @froglifers @PondRiverStream @EnvAgency @WWTconservation @WildlifeTrusts @angling_times @NFUtweets @CLAtweets The system we have forged for nature recovery in Britain is wheezing along like an old robin reliant it‚Äôs inadequate and profoundly pointless. These kids and others like them should be given an immediate role with adequate information and implored to assist.

tweets.text: Looking for a map showing how tidal regimes reach up UK rivers - is there such a thing or will I have to make it myself?

‚ö†Ô∏è @EnvAgency flood warnings and flood alerts in force on several rivers in the county this evening.

Details here ‚û°Ô∏è https://t.co/5xRmAfX37h https://t.co/6Uj163V170

@SteveCJjones @MarkAvery @CelticReptile @patrick_barkham @BenGoldsmith @gow_derek @NaturalEngland @ChrisGPackham @GeorgeMonbiot @ARC_Bytes @froglifers @PondRiverStream @EnvAgency @WWTconservation @WildlifeTrusts @angling_times @NFUtweets @CLAtweets I think we can choose to be super cautious and 'led by the science' or we can choose life. This is not described as an emergency for nothing.

@MarkAvery @TheMushyPea @CelticReptile @patrick_barkham @BenGoldsmith @gow_derek @NaturalEngland @ChrisGPackham @GeorgeMonbiot @ARC_Bytes @froglifers @PondRiverStream @EnvAgency @WWTconservation @WildlifeTrusts @angling_times @NFUtweets @CLAtweets It‚Äôs brilliant and inspiring

@MarkAvery @CelticReptile @patrick_barkham @gow_derek @NaturalEngland @ChrisGPackham @GeorgeMonbiot @ARC_Bytes @froglifers @PondRiverStream @EnvAgency @WWTconservation @WildlifeTrusts @angling_times @NFUtweets @CLAtweets I‚Äôm delighted by it.

@MarkAvery @CelticReptile @patrick_barkham @BenGoldsmith @gow_derek @NaturalEngland @ChrisGPackham @GeorgeMonbiot @ARC_Bytes @froglifers @PondRiverStream @EnvAgency @WWTconservation @WildlifeTrusts @angling_times @NFUtweets @CLAtweets I think it‚Äôs great to see young people doing this.  Good luck to them.

urls.title: Eye On Calderdale
urls.description: Your one stop website for up to date information about flooding, weather and traffic disruptions across the Borough of Calderdale.

tweets.text:
#MytholmroydFAS - We're reinforcing the river bank  between White Houses & Hawksclough to provide extra protection against scour in high river flows.

To do this safely we need to close one lane on Burnley Road during working hours next week. 
#flooding 

https://t.co/HgdBp7TncO https://t.co/zPCza70bYH

@AdamBaylissEA @EnvAgencyYNE Is that at rother valley country park?
Good job in these temperature's, not fun working with cold metal things!
@LisaLevs Hello, please report this to our incident team on 0800 80 70 60. They will need to take further information from you Kind Regards

Various flood alerts and warnings in place across the Yorkshire & Humber Drainage area, with more rain and snow due over the coming days. Please use the @EnvAgencyYNE information and sign up to flood alerts in the catchment that might affect your property or business. #floodaware https://t.co/rtvmi89ZJs

tweets.text: @ben_watt @NaturalEngland @CRTContactUs @Brent_Council @EnvAgency @ChrisGPackham @WildLondon @Thames21 That last photo is particularly heartbreaking. Something must be done by those responsible. Yes, there is COVID and cuts. But there‚Äôs always a reason given not to act. Enough is enough. Protect our waters and our environment now. @Feargal_Sharkey  @GeorgeMonbiot @BarnetCouncil
